<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Wadjet (The Green Empress)](/Deities.aspx?ID=643)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 6

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Defend your homelands and your people, aid childbirths, grow papyrus, protect sources of clean water

**Anathema** Refuse to help a drowning creature, harm a rightful ruler

**Area of Concern**
Good serpents, the River Sphinx, wisdom

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Light Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=360)

**Domains** [Protection](/Domains.aspx?ID=90), [Travel](/Domains.aspx?ID=93), [Water](/Domains.aspx?ID=98), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Hydraulic Push](/Spells.aspx?ID=1561)

- **2nd**
[Animal Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1440)
(snake only)

- **4th**
[Reflective Scales](/Spells.aspx?ID=2362)

</column>
name: Wadjet (The Green Empress)
